001package net.tvburger.jdl.adaline;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Floats;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LinesAndCircles;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.LogicalDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Trainer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.loss.Objectives;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.ChainedRegime;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes.Regimes;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.ImageViewer;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.listeners.EpochRmePlotter;
015
016import java.util.Arrays;
017
018public class AdalineMain {
019
020    public static void main(String[] args) {
021        DataSet<Float> dataSet = LogicalDataSets.toMinusSet(new LinesAndCircles().load());
022        DataSet<Float> trainingSet = dataSet.subset(10, dataSet.size());
023        DataSet<Float> testSet = dataSet.subset(0, 10);
024
025        Adaline adaline = Adaline.create(400, 8);
026        ObjectiveFunction<Float> objective = Objectives.mSE(JavaNumberTypeSupport.FLOAT);
027        LeastMeanSquares leastMeanSquares = new LeastMeanSquares(0.01f);
028        EpochRmePlotter epochRmePlotter = new EpochRmePlotter();
029        epochRmePlotter.display();
030        ChainedRegime regime = Regimes.epochs(100,
031                epochRmePlotter.attach("Training Set (" + trainingSet.size() + ")"),
032                epochRmePlotter.attach("Test Set (" + testSet.size() + ")", testSet)).stochastic();
033        Trainer<Adaline, Float> adalineTrainer = Trainer.of(new AdalineInitializer(), objective, leastMeanSquares, regime);
034        adalineTrainer.train(adaline, trainingSet);
035
036        int i = 0;
037        int correct = 0;
038        int wrong = 0;
039        for (DataSet.Sample<Float> sample : testSet) {
040            i++;
041            boolean[] estimate = adaline.classify(sample.features());
042            boolean[] target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.0f);
043            if (!Arrays.equals(target, estimate)) {
044                wrong++;
045                String label = createLabel(i, target, estimate);
046                ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, fromMinusSet(sample));
047                image.display();
048            } else {
049                correct++;
050            }
051        }
052        if (wrong == 0) {
053            DataSet.Sample<Float> sample = testSet.samples().getFirst();
054            boolean[] estimate = adaline.classify(sample.features());
055            boolean[] target = Floats.toBooleans(sample.targetOutputs(), 0.0f);
056            String label = createLabel(1, target, estimate);
057            ImageViewer image = ImageViewer.fromPerceptronImage(label, fromMinusSet(sample));
058            image.display();
059        }
060        System.out.println("Correct: " + correct + ", Wrong: " + wrong + ", Total: " + (correct + wrong));
061    }
062
063    private static DataSet.Sample<Float> fromMinusSet(DataSet.Sample<Float> sample) {
064        Float[] features = sample.features();
065        for (int i = 0; i < features.length; i++) {
066            if (Floats.equals(features[i], -1.0f)) {
067                features[i] = 0.0f;
068            }
069        }
070        return new DataSet.Sample<>(features, sample.targetOutputs());
071    }
072
073    private static String createLabel(int i, boolean[] target, boolean[] estimate) {
074        String label = "";
075        boolean wrong = false;
076        label += estimate[0] ? "Circle " : "Line ";
077        if (target[0] != estimate[0]) {
078            wrong = true;
079        }
080        label += estimate[1] ? "Left" : "Right";
081        if (target[1] != estimate[1]) {
082            wrong = true;
083        }
084        return i + ". " + (wrong ? "X: " : "V: ") + label;
085    }
086
087}
